summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VitalWave healthcare platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has session management issues preventing full navigation testing.

ui_bugs.issue: User sessions expire immediately after login, preventing navigation between pages
Language selection in dropdown has overlay interception issues

integration_issues.issue: Frontend authentication tokens not persisting between page navigations

passed_tests: Backend API - Doctors listing and details (100% success)
Backend API - AI Chat functionality (100% success)
Backend API - Nearby places API (100% success)
Backend API - Text upload and analysis (100% success)
Backend API - My Health APIs (100% success)
Frontend - Landing page loads with VitalWave branding
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend session management - authentication tokens are not persisting between page navigations, causing immediate redirects to login page. This prevents testing of protected routes and core app functionality. Check AuthContext token storage and API request headers.
